snippet: Speaking to the press after the Nevada caucuses, Newt Gingrich repeatedly hammered Mitt Romney as a pro-abortion, pro-gun control, pro-taxes candidate of the establishment.
abstract: Speaking to the press after the Nevada caucuses, Newt Gingrich repeatedly hammered Mitt Romney as a pro-abortion, pro-gun control, pro-taxes candidate of the establishment.

headline.main: Gingrich Pledges Bitter Battle Until Convention
